name: Lifestealer
title: N'aix
lore: N'aix was a wizard's experiment gone wrong. Now he escapes only through feeding on the life essence of others.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Lifestealer becomes spell immune and gains bonus attack speed.

feast.name: Feast
feast.description: Lifestealer's attacks deal bonus damage based on the target's current HP and heals him.

ghoulFrenzy.name: Ghoul Frenzy
ghoulFrenzy.description: Passively grants Lifestealer bonus attack speed and slow on attacks.

infest.name: Infest
infest.description: Lifestealer hides inside a target unit. When he emerges, he damages nearby enemies.
